description:
The Glasses Club faces its greatest crisis yet. Because it does not meet the Student Council`s regulation that every club have at least five members, they must recruit a new member by the end of the day or be disbanded. While the rest of the club goes about trying to recruit more members, Yukiya remains focused on the development of the X-Ray Glasses.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Come, Glasses Wearers! Your Glasses Will Change the World!
Kitare! Meganemono! Omae no Megane ga Sekai o Kaeru
来たれ! メガネ者! お前のメガネが世界を変える
